snippet: On Tuesday, a new set of owners will represent the league in talks with the players’ union, as the sides try a different tack to jump-start stalled negotiations for a new collective bargaining agreement.
abstract: New set of team owners will represent the NHL in talks with the players' union, as two sides attempt to jump-start stalled negotiations on new collective bargaining agreement.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, a new set of owners will represent the league in talks with the players’ union, as the sides try a different tack to jump-start stalled negotiations for a new collective bargaining agreement.

headline.seo: New Faces at the N.H.L. Negotiating Table
headline.main: New Faces at the N.H.L. Negotiating Table
headline.print_headline:
New Group
Of Owners
Is Set to Enter
N.H.L. Talks
